text: MSC | DevOps | Permanent | Fulltime | Bethesda MD / Washington DC | ONSITE | VISA Medical Science & Computing (MSC) is hiring devops at the National Center for Biotechnology Information (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov) https://ejob.bz/ATS/PortalViewRequirement.do?reqGK=26943688 Tech: Linux, Python, Django, Scala/Finagle, SaltStack, consul, packer, linkerd, TeamCity, docker/mesos/kubernetes, aws/gce Small, fast-moving team, smart people, great culture, great opportunities, lots of potential. Help bring progress to an amazingly important public resource!
